history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_spec. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_spec,is_lim_comp_seq,Rbar_loc_seq. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_spec,is_lim_comp_seq,Rbar_loc_seq. apply Lim_seq_opp.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R x : Rbar H : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> is_lim' f x l H0 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim' f x l -> is_lim f x l Unable to unify "forall P : R -> Prop, Rbar_locally ?M2654 P -> filtermap (fun n : nat => ?M2651 (Rbar_loc_seq x n)) eventually P" with "Lim (fun y : R => - f y) x = Rbar_opp (Lim f x)".

In environment H2 : forall (f : R -> R) (u : nat -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> eventually (fun n : nat => u n = x -> False) -> is_lim_seq u x -> is_lim_seq (fun n : nat => f (u n)) l f : R -> R x : Rbar H : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> is_lim' f x l H0 : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim' f x l -> is_lim f x l H4 : nat -> R Unable to unify "match ?M3134 with | Finite l => forall eps : posreal, Rbar_locally' ?M3133 (fun y : R => Rabs (?M3132 y - l) < eps) | p_infty => forall M : R, Rbar_locally' ?M3133 (fun y : R => M < ?M3132 y) | m_infty => forall M : R, Rbar_locally' ?M3133 (fun y : R => ?M3132 y < M) end" with "Lim (fun y : R => - f y) x = Rbar_opp (Lim f x)".
The reference eventually_loc_seq was not found in the current environment.

original: intros H. apply is_lim_spec in H. apply is_lim_comp_seq with (u := Rbar_loc_seq x). - apply H. - apply eventually_loc_seq. - apply is_lim_seq_refl. - apply is_lim_seq_unique. apply is_lim_comp_seq with (u := Rbar_loc_seq x). ++ apply H. ++ apply eventually_loc_seq. ++ apply is_lim_seq_refl.
